tool_description: The "PDF to OCR" API is a powerful tool that allows developers to convert regular PDF documents into PDFs with an OCR (Optical Character Recognition) layer. This API combines the functionalities of PDF processing and OCR technology to enhance the usability and accessibility of PDF files.
name: PDF to OCR
title: PDF to OCR

api_list.name: request results of uuid
api_list.description: After submission with POST /process-pdf a uuid is returned. This uuid is used to retrieve the result. If a result is available, the response contains the base64 string with a PDF/A with text-layer.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-to-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/ocr-pdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-to-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: process-pdf
api_list.description: Submit a pdf file in base64 format to the endpoint. The file will be processes as soon a worker is free.
api_list.code:
